stories.text:
Hey HN,

We wrote a short primer on DAOs and their growth over the past year, including perspectives on pitfalls and potential.

We'd love to hear your thoughts!

https://www.smallstepcap.com/decentralized-autonomous-organizations-for-the-everyman/
stories.title: An Accessible Primer for Decentralized Autonomous Organizations

stories.text: Out of habit I have been using Font awesome for quite some time now, but since Font Awesome seemingly has pivoted into a SaaS product, what open source icon font packs do you use for your project?
stories.title: Ask HN: Best open source icon font pack?
Douglas Trumbull, visual effects artist on 2001: A Space Odyssey, dies at 79

stories.text:
As an embedded developer, I am always happy to see threads about embedded hardware and software, new SoC / MCU releases etc, but these are rare here.

I was wondering if there is something similar. I know about the subreddits, but they tend to be a bit chaotic and not entirely what I am looking for.
stories.title: Ask HN: HN but for Embedded Hard- & Software
